pages.text:
.entry-header
EVENTS
Service Industry Night!
SIN at the Pub every Sunday from 9pm-11pm. It’s Service Industry Night! The music goes up and the drink prices go down for hospitality workers. Party with us in a smoke-free environment
(smoking allowed outside)
. Unwind, have some pub food from our late night menu, order a few cocktails and chill.
Happy Hour
Join us everyday from 2pm-6pm for $3 PBR, $4 wells and wines, and $5 Jameson. We have pre-chilled Jameo on tap!
Late Night Happy Hour runs Sunday-Thursday 9pm-11pm
.
Teacher Feature Friday
Are you a local Lake County, FL teacher or support staff? Unwind after school with your co-workers. We offer select 1/2 price appetizers on Fridays from 2pm-6pm.  Talk to a manager when you arrive and we’ll give you a free, reusable card to show your server so you can take advantage of these specials.
.entry-content .clear
